summary:
The more I fucking think about it, the more Noora/Manon’s actions in Season 4 make sense to me
In Season 2, even though they...
body:
The more I fucking think about it, the more Noora/Manon’s actions in Season 4 make sense to me

In Season 2, even though they both struggled with having feelings for a guy that their friend liked, they both still fully acted on those feelings despite how Vilde or Daphne would feel.

Manon making a move on Sofiane even though she suspected Imane had feelings for him is 100% in character.

summary:
I'm sorry but that last clip sucked 😔
I didn't like the footage they use to shot the girl squad reaction upon seeing Charles. It...
body:
I’m sorry but that last clip sucked 😔

I didn’t like the footage they use to shot the girl squad reaction upon seeing Charles. It wasn’t a good shot because oh God their reactions seemed a tad bit too dramatic.. Emma especially…

Also why did they make Charles aged like 15 years..

Please at this point the saving grace of this show I’m looking forward to it is Imane, Idriss, Lucas and Eliott’s situation.

I really want to like this season guys, I really do but it’s so draggyyyyyyyyy. Last season was so fast paced and re-watchable. This one I can’t see myself to watch it over and over because of the pain 😩

summary: people actually have been saying that Maxcence deserved to be stalked and he shouldn't complain about his 'fans' since he is a...
question: people actually have been saying that Maxcence deserved to be stalked and he shouldn't complain about his 'fans' since he is a celebrity?! What the actual fuck.
answer:
to be fair I only saw one ask on here saying that, but the fact that people actually followed him on the metro today means that they thought he deserved it. which is just disgusting and terrifying. but yeah… there is no possible logical explanation to justify that.

and he 100% has the right to complain. he doesn’t owe us anything, yet he does so much for us. people are so fucking entitled it’s ridiculous. I think it’s great that he called them out, because hopefully that will have a real impact. who knows tho.

blog.description: 🇧🇷 Prompts, headcanons, anything you want! (english is not my first language, so I'm sorry for any mistake)

summary: Ok, desculpa de antemão se vc não gosta! Kkkkk Vingadores: Ultimato estréia essa semana (e se vc tá no mundo, já deve tá sabendo...
question: Ok, desculpa de antemão se vc não gosta! Kkkkk Vingadores: Ultimato estréia essa semana (e se vc tá no mundo, já deve tá sabendo né kkkkkk) Eu queria muito saber pra vc (se é que vc curte Marvel e super heróis, but) quais personagens os meninos seriam? Os da Itália principalmente, pois eu os amo demais! Você escreve tão bem então pode ser uma fanfic, algo como eles discutindo isso num dia chill, pode ser um headcanon~ O que for melhor pra vc, tá valendo!! Sua escrita é linda, flor! 💚🤗
answer:
HAHAHAHAHA desculpa pela demora na resposta! Acredite ou não, eu ainda não assisti Vingadores…(nem Capitã Marvel, nem Homem Formiga e a Vespa…). Brigada pelos elogios!!! Vou tentar uns headcanons se tudo bem por você. Desculpa de novo pela demora!! <33


This prompt is about who of the Avengers each of the Italian boys would be. I haven’t watched the last few movies from Marvel, so I’m just writing on what I know/imagine from the characters. I’m not the biggest fan so please don’t hate me :D

—————————————————–


- Gio would be Captain America. He’s kind, caring, aware of his surroundings and intelligent. He cares deeply about his loved ones, he would go to war (or die) for Martino.

- I mean, since Gio is Captain America…Martino sort of should be Bucky, right? If not Bucky, he could be Spider-Man. The superhero that it’s so soft and cute and innocent and that wants to be off the spotlight, just protect his friends and neighbors…

- Elia is a mixture of Thor and Hawkeye. He has humor and he’s also very protective over his loved ones, but he is a bit stubborn, impulsive but he can still think (for a second) when in a bad situation. 

- Luca is a mixture of Thor and Ant-Man, he’s funny, kind of silly, but committed to his friends and to have their back if they ever need him. He knows he’s the weak one, but he’s ready! Just call him and he will be there. 

- Nico is Iron Man. He’s has a different kind of humor, he loves his person mostly, then his friends and he’s really smart, if he needs to make a decision, if he’s unattached, he can make the choices. 


I know you asked mostly about the italian boys, but a long time ago I wrote prompt thinking about Lucas (from SKAM France) being baby Groot and that’s it, he’s baby Groot. And just because he is Groot, Eliott has to be…Rocket <3
answer_abstract:
HAHAHAHAHA desculpa pela demora na resposta! Acredite ou não, eu ainda não assisti Vingadores…(nem Capitã Marvel, nem Homem Formiga e a Vespa…). Brigada pelos elogios!!! Vou tentar uns headcanons se tudo bem por você. Desculpa de novo pela demora!! <33

summary: i cant believe people are saying maxence deserved to be stalked and even that he encourages it.what is wrong with people? the...
question: i cant believe people are saying maxence deserved to be stalked and even that he encourages it.what is wrong with people? the stupidity! it seriously makes me want to distance myself from the fandom. i can't tell if theyre just trolls or what but it makes me sick to think that there are people like that.
answer:
the whole situation is just sad to me. I’ve seen so many posts that have made all the necessary points already but no one deserves to be treated like that. it doesn’t matter if you’re a celebrity. and doing nice things for your fans in no way means you’re encouraging stalking. he may be nice and share parts of his life on social media, but maxence is not our friend. I’m sure he can take care of himself and has a good support system, but still, he’s not a character to be consumed.

the part that hurts me the most is that he has said on multiple occasions that he has issues with anxiety. and despite that, he tries so hard to attend events, do live-streams, and more. to simply disregard someone’s mental health for your own selflish reasons is cruel. I’m glad maxence called them out and I hope they learn their lesson. I wouldn’t blame him for being less active on social media for the sake of his own safety and mental health.

also, to the people who say he deserves that, have some fucking compassion.

I’m sure he can take care of himself and has a good support system, but still, he’s not a character to be consumed.

the part that hurts me the most is that he has said on multiple occasions that he has issues with anxiety. and despite that, he tries so hard to attend events, do live-streams, and more. to simply disregard someone’s mental health for your own selflish reasons is cruel. also, to the people who say he deserves that, have some fucking compassion.

summary: I KNEW sofiane and sofimane was too good to be true.. I guess I'll never learn *cries* I just can't imagine how they're going to...
question: I KNEW sofiane and sofimane was too good to be true.. I guess I'll never learn *cries* I just can't imagine how they're going to explain THAT disaster
answer: right? it sucks because can you imagine how amazing sofimane could’ve been without all this bs?? i think they’re going with an open ending for sofimane at the end of the finale ffffff and 80% change was charles showing up 2 episodes early it looks like ffffff. and it if they do get renewed, i think it’ll be all sofiane and imane are trying long distance or some shit. i just can’t wait to see idriss tbh, i hope we get a clip with him tomorrow!

summary:
Imane is not getting enough credit for sticking around when Sofiane walked up to collect Manon.
Me (if I were Imane): oh would...
body:
Imane is not getting enough credit for sticking around when Sofiane walked up to collect Manon.

Me (if I were Imane): oh would you look at that I forgot my book bag.

Daphné: Imane your wearing your book bag.

Me (if I were Imane): I mean my other book bag. Byeeeeeeeeee.

The squad (still dense AF): that was weird!

summary: the fact that manon and sofiane are doing this most likely to make imane jealous (and maybe charles too?) is so much worse......
body:
the fact that manon and sofiane are doing this most likely to make imane jealous (and maybe charles too?) is so much worse…

like i would have been okay if they really liked each other and started to date and maybe broke up later idk

but the fact that they are willingly rubbing it in front of imane when at least sofiane knows the reason she can’t be with him, which is not that she doesn’t like him…

it’s just smt weird to do and i hate that he is willingly hurting imane like that.

also after all the things charles said to manon about his brother and the trial and how broken she was last year I really don’t want to see them together again…
